product_name: ExOfficio Gallivant Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Tough, durable, weather-resistant and easy to carry, the ExOfficio Gallivant(TM) Capris will get you through any adventure. The only thing you need to do is remember to pack them! Lightweight, durable nylon fabric resists water, stains and wind; added stretch frees up leg movement. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, keeping you dry in light rain. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays, keeping your skin safe no matter how long your day lasts. Adjustable drawcord waistband. ExOfficio Gallivant Capri Pants feature hand pockets and a zippered security pocket on lower right leg. Closeout.
short_description: Tough, durable, weather-resistant and easy to carry, the ExOfficio Gallivant(TM) Capris will get you through any adventure. The only thing you need to do is remember to pack them!
